name: nuxt-firebase
description: Nust.js deploy ready for firebase functions and host
author: Luca Pulira <luca.pulira@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean;npm run build:nuxt;npm run copy # for Firebase
scripts.copy: mkdir dist;cp -R functions dist/server;cp -R app/static/ dist/client;cp -R .nuxt dist/server;cp -R dist/server/.nuxt/dist dist/client/assets
